CustomField.description: Formula to compute the scoring before insert and after update
CustomField.formula: "FORMULA NO MORE USED - TO BE DELETED" /* IF( (IF(ISNUMBER(Q02Answer__c),VALUE(Q02Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q03Answer__c),VALUE(Q03Answer__c) < 7,false)) && ( IF(ISNUMBER(Q05Answer__c),VALUE(Q05Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q06Answer__c),VALUE(Q06Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q07Answer__c),VALUE(Q07Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q08Answer__c),VALUE(Q08Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q09Answer__c),VALUE(Q09Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q10Answer__c),VALUE(Q10Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q11Answer__c),VALUE(Q11Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q12Answer__c),VALUE(Q12Answer__c) < 7,false) || Q13Answer__c ="No" || Q14Answer__c ="No" || IF(ISNUMBER(Q15Answer__c),VALUE(Q15Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q16Answer__c),VALUE(Q16Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q17Answer__c),VALUE(Q17Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q18Answer__c),VALUE(Q18Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q19Answer__c),VALUE(Q19Answer__c) < 7,false) ), "Recovery Act", IF( Q03Answer__c ="10" && Q02Answer__c ="10" && (Q05Answer__c ="09" || Q05Answer__c ="10") && (Q06Answer__c ="09" || Q06Answer__c ="10") && (Q07Answer__c ="09" || Q07Answer__c ="10") && (Q08Answer__c ="09" || Q08Answer__c ="10") && (Q09Answer__c ="09" || Q09Answer__c ="10") && (Q10Answer__c ="09" || Q10Answer__c ="10") && (Q11Answer__c ="09" || Q11Answer__c ="10") && (Q12Answer__c ="09" || Q12Answer__c ="10") && Q13Answer__c ="Yes" && Q14Answer__c ="Yes" && (Q15Answer__c ="09" || Q15Answer__c ="10") && (Q16Answer__c ="09" || Q16Answer__c ="10") && (Q17Answer__c ="09" || Q17Answer__c ="10") && ( Q18Answer__c ="N/A" || Q18Answer__c ="09" || Q18Answer__c ="10") && ( Q19Answer__c ="N/A" || Q19Answer__c ="09" || Q19Answer__c ="10"), "Delighted Client", IF( (Q03Answer__c ="09"|| Q03Answer__c ="10"), "Promoter", "Neutral") ) ) */
CustomField.label: Tech Web Scoring Formula
